"Hampden": "...Great. I'll tell you what you need to know, then."
"Photon Scales are a blue, glossy Ore."
"...They don't just look beautiful. They're also incredible to touch. They're so smooth and silky, I could spend all day stroking them... Hehe."
"...They can be used to enhance equipment, just like any other Ore."
"...You should be able to find some if you poke around Southern Retem. Why don't you go and take a look?"
